sentence: A  large-scale  invasion  would  likely  mark  a  significant  and  deadly  turning  point  in  a  war  that  has  already  seen  more  than  1,400  dead  in  Israel  and  7,300  dead  in  Gaza,  according  to  respective  officials.

A  large-scale  invasion  would  likely  mark  a  significant  and  deadly  turning  point  in  a  war  that  has  already  seen  more  than  1,400  dead  in  Israel  and  7,300  dead  in  Gaza,  according  to  respective  officials.
